title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on the Education Policy Institute Report
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 18 February 2021.
content:
The Conservatives have treated children as an afterthought throughout this pandemic and should be far more ambitious for their recovery.
